
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(modelr)
library(e1071)
```

```{r}
model <- 
	glm(
		fastball ~ s_count + b_count + pitch_num + last_ff_not,
		data = df_final,
		family = "binomial"
	)

tidy(model)

df_final_with_pred <- 
	df_final %>% 
	add_predictions(model, type = "response")

df_final_with_pred %>% 
	ggplot(aes(x = pred)) +
	geom_histogram() +
	facet_wrap(~ fastball, ncol = 1)

df_final_with_pred %>% 
	mutate(
		correct = 
			ifelse(
				(pred > 0.5 & fastball == 1) |
					(pred < 0.5 & fastball == 0),
				1,
				0
			)
	) %>% 
	summarize(mean(correct, na.rm = TRUE))
```

```{r}
model_svm <- 
	svm(
		fastball ~ s_count + b_count + pitch_num + last_ff_not,
		data = 
			df_final %>% 
			mutate(fastball = ifelse(fastball == 1, 1, -1))
	)

df_final %>% 
	slice(-1) %>% 
	mutate(pred = predict(model_svm)) %>% 
	mutate(pred2 = as.integer(pred > 0)) %>% 
	mutate(
		correct = fastball == pred2
	) %>% 
	summarize(mean(correct))
```
